PasswordAuthentication(java.lang.String,.Description: Creates a new PasswordAuthentication object from the given user name and password. Note that the given user password is cloned before it is stored in the new PasswordAuthentication object.
Creates a new PasswordAuthentication object from the given user name and password. Note that the given user password is cloned before it is stored in the new PasswordAuthentication object.

getPassword().Description: Returns the user password. Note that this method returns a reference to the password. It is the caller's responsibility to zero out the password information after it is no longer needed.

ClassDesc: The class PasswordAuthentication is a data holder that is used by Authenticator. It is simply a repository for a user name and a password.
